name: hoover.js
description: Hoover sound for Web Audio API
author: youpy <youpy@buycheapviagraonlinenow.com>

scripts.watch: fswatch -E -e flymake.js -e '\.(jade|scss)$' -i '\.js$' -r ./src | xargs -I{} -n 1 npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-to5 && npm run build-browser && npm run build-minify
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run livereload & gulp connect
